item.title: reggie:D
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

okay so when i click on reggie, nothing happens, but here in my dialogue handler has what hes supposed to say case 71: sendNpcChat4("I have found two secret tunnels!", "I saw a giant mole and some Red Dragons!", "Help me defeat them?", "Would you like me, to bring you there?", c.talkingNpc, "Bonafido"); c.nextChat = 72; break; case 72: sendOption2("Giant Mole", "Red Dragons (43 Wildy)"); c.dialogueAction = 13; c.dialogueId = 72; c.teleAction = -1; break;

Read full topic
